text: Hilton Alger is a hotel in Algiers, Algeria, operated by Hilton Hotels. It closed in 2017 for renovations.https://www.hotelmanagement.net/development/oil-revenue-flagging- algeria-turns-to-tourism The hotel contains 412 rooms, including 40 deluxe suites. It is served by the Sara restaurant which serves Mediterranean cuisine, the Casbah which serves traditional Algerian cuisine and Tamina, which serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. The hotel also has numerous bars and lounges. ==References== ==External links== * Official Website Category:Hotels in Algiers Category:Hotels in Algeria Alger Category:Hotel buildings completed in 1992
title: Hilton Alger
